description:
Food freedom. Health freedom. Medical freedom. We are advocates for the rights of individuals to choose what they put into their bodies and how to live.

The issue with ""COVID contact tracing"" is that the data collected pertaining to our movement could be used to impinge the aforementioned freedoms. Not to mention the way it compromises our privacy.

To avoid being traced, we suggest you follow the steps outlined here if you have an iPhone or Android phone.

Does the topic of privacy or medical freedom matter to you? If so, why?
